casebody.data:
No. 09-1184. Michael Stratechuk, Individually and on Behalf of His Minor Children, Petitioner v. Board of Education, South Orange-Maplewood School District, et al. 562 U.S. 828, 131 S. Ct. 72,

178 L. Ed. 2d 24,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6598. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Same case below, 587 F.3d 597.
